title: rArA rAjIva
sahitya:
rArA rAjIva lOcana rAma nannu brOcuTaku dhIrA shrtajana mandAra karuparAvAra


anupallavi

  ErA nI karuNa galgani kAraNamEmO gAnarA mArAri
 vinuta subada sucarita parAtpara dharaNijA manOhara


caraNam    nIvE nA vibhuDani niratamu nI pAdamulanu nera nammiti nIvADani 
nannu karuNinci I vELa dasharatha nrpa nandana dasha mukhAdi sakala 
ripughana haraNa nI vanAdharaNa sEyakurA pAvanajApta shrI vAsudEva
